Contains the different error codes for SoMgr component

Contains the different states in which a socket can be found

Contains the different control states in which a socket can be
Contains the list of all sockets

The socket type indicates that the socket is one of configured socket
range index range: [0,11] values if the index is out of specified range the socket is invalid context task protection none - used from one context
Table stores local IP addresses

It is build based on TcpIpLocalAddr list in Tresos
range index range: [0,21] values if the index is out of specified range the address is invalid context task protection none - used from one context
